Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
(SANITATION TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO CONTINUE TO LEVY A 10 YEAR 11.21 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING AND MAINTAINING SOLID AND LIQUID WASTE COLLECTION AND DISPOSAL FACILITIES AND SERVICES FOR SAID PARISH AND PURCHASING THE NECESSARY SITES AND EQUIPMENT THEREFOR, TITLE TO WHICH SHALL BE IN THE PUBLIC.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy an eleven and twenty-one hundredths (11.21) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in said Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of providing and maintaining solid and liquid waste collection and disposal facilities and services for said Parish and purchasing the necessary sites and equipment therefor, title to which shall be in the public?

Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(DRAINAGE TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO CONTINUE TO LEVY A 10 YEAR 7.31 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF OPERATING, MAINTAINING AND CONSTRUCTING DRAINAGE WORKS WITHIN AND FOR SAID PARISH, TITLE TO WHICH SHALL BE IN THE PUBLIC.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a seven and thirty-one hundredths (7.31) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of operating, maintaining and constructing drainage works within and for said Parish, title to which shall be in the public?

Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 3
(MENTALLY RETARDED TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO CONTINUE TO LEVY A 10 YEAR 5.33 MILLS PROPERTY 
TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF OPERATING, MAINTAINING AND CONSTRUCTING SCHOOLS FOR THE MENTALLY RETARDED AND TO ADMINISTER TO THE HEALTH AND EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS OF TRAINABLE AND BELOW TRAINABLE INDIVIDUALS IN TERREBONNE PARISH.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a five and thirty-three hundredths (5.33) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of operating, maintaining and constructing schools for the mentally retarded and to administer to the health and educational requirements of trainable and below trainable individuals in Terrebonne Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Houma -- Prop. #1 - 5.08 Mill - Parish Council - 10 Yr
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
 (FIRE PROTECTION TAX RENEWAL) 

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO CONTINUE TO LEVY A 10 YEAR 5.08 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES IN SAID CITY INCLUDING THE PURCHASE OF FIRE TRUCKS AND EQUIPMENT THEREFOR.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Houma, State of Louisiana (the "City"), continue to levy a five and eight hundredths (5.08) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in said City for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities in said City including the purchase of fire trucks and equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Houma -- Prop. #2 - 5.08 Mill - Parish Council - 10 Yr
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(POLICE PROTECTION TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO CONTINUE TO LEVY A 10 YEAR 5.08 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING ADDITIONAL REVENUES FOR THE POLICE PROTECTION FOR SAID CITY.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Houma, State of Louisiana (the "City"), continue to levy a five and eight hundredths (5.08) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in said City for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, the avails of which special tax shall be used solely and exclusively for providing additional revenues for the police protection for said City?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Lighting District #2 -- 3.99 Mill - Parish Council - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD LIGHTING DISTRICT NO. 2 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO CONTINUE TO LEVY A 10 YEAR 3.99 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING AND MAINTAINING ELECTRIC LIGHTS ON THE STREETS, ROADS, HIGHWAYS, ALLEYS AND PUBLIC PLACES WITHIN AND FOR SAID DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Road Lighting District No. 2 of the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a three and ninety-nine hundredths (3.99) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of providing and maintaining electric lights on the streets, roads, highways, alleys and public places within and for said District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Lighting District #4 -- 4.75 Mill - Parish Council - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD LIGHTING DISTRICT NO. 4 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO CONTINUE TO LEVY A 10 YEAR 4.75 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING AND MAINTAINING ELECTRIC LIGHTS ON THE STREETS, ROADS, HIGHWAYS, ALLEYS AND PUBLIC PLACES WITHIN AND FOR SAID DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Road Lighting District No. 4 of the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a four and seventy-five hundredths (4.75) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of providing and maintaining electric lights on the streets, roads, highways, alleys and public places within and for said District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District #6 -- .82 Mill - Parish Council - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD DISTRICT NO. 6 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO CONTINUE TO LEVY A 10 YEAR .82 MILL PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF ACQUIRING, BUILDING, IMPROVING OR MAINTAINING PUBLIC ROADS OR HIGHWAYS IN SAID DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 6 of the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy an eighty-two hundredths (.82) mill tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of acquiring, building, improving or maintaining public roads or highways in said District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 9 -- 15 Mill - BOC - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 9 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO CONTINUE TO LEVY A 10-YEAR 15-MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING SAID DISTRICT'S FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND PAYING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES, INCLUDING FIRE HYDRANTS RENTALS AND SERVICE.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 9 of the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana, continue to levy a fifteen (15) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said Fire District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, inclusive, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating said district's fire protection facilities, and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including fire hydrants rentals and service?
